actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to develop and implement a system for the issuance of social security benefit checks on a staggered or cyclical basis.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to develop a system for the payment on a staggered or cyclical basis during each month of Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance benefits under the Social Security Act and Supplemental Security Income benefits under such Act.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to develop and implement a system for the issuance of social security benefit checks on a staggered or cyclical basis.
